messages.content: They are REBELLIOUS, they are INFURIATED and they are coming to OVERTHROW the human race. THEY are the APES. Join the Rise of the Planet of the Apes page and witness the catastrophe we humans have created. https://www.facebook.com/ApesWillRiseIndia

messages.content: Ladies and Gentlemen, we are now seeing the beginnings of another stage in human evolution. In every human being there exists the genetic code for Mutations. Do you believe in the X-Men Universe? and are you with or against mutants?... Come Join in on all the action, news, views and previews into the X-Men Universe - https://www.facebook.com/xmenmoviesindia
